root.name: Made Man: Confessions of the Family Blood
root.description: GameplayThe game has basic 3rd person shooter mechanics and is linear and story-driven. The story spans three decades in the life of Joey Verola, who the player controls as he tries to become a made man in the mafia. The game takes place in New York City, but flashback scenes take place during the Vietnam War, where Joey saves the life of a Don's right hand man, which in turn gives him the opportunity to become an associate with the mafia. The player uses a variety of firearms and is able to slow down time, similar to the popular Max Payne games. A simple cover mechanic is also included, allowing the player to take cover behind objects and attack when the time is right.
